main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed over Torbay Airport, Newfoundland on March 19, 1953.
interesting points: The object was observed visually for 5-7 minutes and also detected on radar equipment at the airport.
The object was described as silver in color, circular in shape, and approximately 10-15 feet in diameter.
The object was observed at an altitude of 70-130 degrees.
No photos were taken of the object.
sighted object: a silver, circular object roughly 10-15 feet in diameter
